name: Evergreen Clean Energy
overview: Evergreen Clean Energy LLC is a newly formed energy fund seeking to participate in the ownership and operation of clean, renewable energy power plants. Evergreen seeks to benefit from the increasing gap between demand and available supply of clean energy by providing financing solutions that promote the development of renewable energy power plants in partnership with experienced developers. Evergreen intends to focus on developing power plants that generate electricity from geothermal energy, which it believes offers the distinct advantage of being a low-cost and reliable energy source that is capable of generating predictable, stable cash flows for investors.

funding_round.source_description: Raser Technologies and Evergreen Clean Energy Announce Agreement to Structure and Finance the Drilling of Up to 100 MW of Geothermal Power
